ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Cooking Expanded - Sushi
ModMetaData.author: Sarg Bjornson
ModMetaData.description:
Vanilla Cooking Expanded - Sushi is a first sub-module to the new Vanilla Cuisine Expanded mod series. This particular mod introduces medieval stews - which are more nutritious, more expensive soups that are cooked over time on the wood-fired pot.
Ideal for your medieval colonies and long winter nights, these stews remove any debuffs from eating ingredients like insect meat and human meat! Time to sneak some human flesh into your diet.
Bone Apple Tie (sic!).
